meta.description: Provide your offer, ICP, benefits, and competitors. The agent analyzes top-performing landing pages in your sector, then generates 3 complete page variants using AIDA, PAS, and Before-After-Bridge frameworks — including headlines, subheads, benefit sections, testimonial structures, CTAs, FAQs, and objection handling.
meta.note: Import into n8n, reconnect credentials. See README.md for full setup.
